name: Funny Dice-Addictive Game
description:
Simple and fun rolling dice game!
Welcome to Funny Dice. Use your wisdom and luck to roll the dice! Many different new maps are waiting for you to unlock.

How to play:
-Roll the dice to advance and get rewards on the map.
-Unlock the map and go to the next dreamland to get more rewards.


Game Features：
-Addictive gameplay!
-Free time killer game!
-Different maps！
